about_the_game:
Erannorth Renaissance offers a unique blend of deep character customization and a Renaissance-era sandbox world. Your decisions drive the story and shape your destiny through tactical hex-based battles. This is a world where you can explore freely, make impactful choices, and engage in strategic combat, all while forging your unique legacy.

  • Choose Your Hero: Begin your adventure with a pre-generated character, or craft a custom character. Each character's backstory is just the start—your decisions will shape their present and future, offering a unique narrative with every playthrough.
  • Evolved Customization: Dive deeper into character customization with straightforward, intuitive mechanics. Tailor your adventuring party with diverse skills, equipment, and strategic choices that reflect your gameplay style.
  • A Living World Awaits: Explore a vast, open-world Renaissance setting that dynamically evolves with your decisions. The main storyline serves as your introduction, but the real adventure begins as you carve your path through the countless choices and lives you can lead.
  • Rich Social Interactions: Engage with hundreds of unique NPCs, each with their own stories and personalities. Build lasting friendships, face formidable foes, or explore romance in an optional dating-sim experience. Each interaction enriches your experience, making the game deeply immersive and personal.
  • Strategic Combat: Master a sophisticated, hex-based combat system accessible to newcomers yet deep enough to challenge seasoned strategists. Your tactical decisions are crucial, turning each battle into a thrilling and rewarding experience.
  • Unleash Your Power: Command the battlefield with an extensive arsenal of weapons and powerful magic. Develop your skills and abilities as you progress, shaping your character into a legend of your own making.
  • Forge Unlikely Alliances: Navigate a complex network of relationships involving secret societies, ancient vampires, and mystical deities. The alliances you form, and your decisions will significantly impact the world's balance of power.

In the Erannorth Renaissance, your choices are your legacy. Will you become a beacon of hope in a fracturing world, or will darker ambitions guide your way? The tapestry of your story unfurls with every action.

Answer the call and shape your destiny.

content_descriptors.notes:
Erannorth Renaissance contains mature themes that may not be suitable for all audiences. This includes textual descriptions and/or references to violence, alcohol use, death, and murder.

Additionally, the game features optional romantic storylines that can lead to intimate scenes between the main character and their romantic partners. Depending on user settings, these scenes may either fade to black immediately or include more detailed textual descriptions.

Please note that none of this content is visually depicted.

detailed_description:
Disclaimer

Erannorth Renaissance is a text-rich game, with most interactions, from storytelling to NPC dialogues, presented through detailed text. Ideal for fans of choose-your-own-adventure and gamebook formats, this game involves significant reading.

name: Erannorth Renaissance

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64bit
  • Processor: i5 CPU equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 support / 2 GB.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 x64bit
  • Processor: i7 CPU equivalent or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 support / 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Erannorth Renaissance combines deep character customization with a dynamic sandbox world. Your choices drive the narrative and strategic hex-based battles shape your fate. Explore, make meaningful decisions, and forge your unique legacy through alliances and rivalries.
